titleStmt.title: The argument of the pastorall of Florimene with the discription of the scœnes and intermedij. Presented by the Queenes Maiesties commandment, before the Kings Maiesty in the hall at White-hall, on S. Thomas day the 21. of December. M.DC.XXXV.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Thomas Walkley, neere White-hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
